He does not want to stop there; he plans to save more to support the studies of his last child, and secure his retirement and that of his wife.

loans.use: pineapples and papayas

loans.name: You's Group

texts.en: You, 49, is a married mother of seven children, three among them are dependent and only one of them is in school. She lives in Cheung Prey district of Kampong Cham province. The main source of her family’s income has been from rice farming for 29 nine years and to earn more income, she works as a construction worker as well. These sources earn her about 45,000 KHR per day. Her group consists of four members, and this is the third loan cycle for her with VisionFund. The previous loans helped her to gain more money and have more land for doing farming. Now she is leading the group to take this loan with her portion being used to buy fertilizer. She hopes that she can earn more money and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Pacar Seribu Group

texts.en:
Like their group’s name, Pacar Seribu (seribu = thousand), they can sell a thousand Pacar flowers to the big buyers. And the group earned a satisfactory profit. Ni Putu, as the group head, had a very satisfactory result. She sold 5 kgs flowers per day and the price per kg is 25,000 IDR. Every day, she sets aside the profit from the 25,000 IDR until she has 50,000 IDR for saving. It's all for her family's future needs. Her husband helps her to maintain the soil.

Seeing a satisfactory profit, the Pacar Seribu Group decided to continue their loan. This time, the loan is not only for farming, but also for supporting other businesses, such as livestock and a small kiosk. Ni Putu used her portion of the loan to purchase Pacar flower seeds, fertilizer and farming tools for her husband. She is still increasing her saving and will use it later to rent more land to plant Pacar flowers. She and her husband love to farm and they hope the land can produce the maximum amount of flowers and they can earn the maximum profit.

loans.use: to purchase Pacar flower seeds, fertilizer and farming tools for her husband

loans.name: Sreyneang

texts.en: Sreyneang is a 25-year-old single factory worker who lives in the Kampong Speu Province of Cambodia. She has worked in the factory since 2012, earning around $5 per day. Sreyneang would like to buy construction materials to renovate her house but she is short of finances, so she needs a loan. With this loan, she will be able to have enough finances to renovate her house and have a proper house to live in. For her future, she is going to save money to fill in the soil around her house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to renovate her house

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.en: Dilfuza is a capable woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1987. She is living in a small village where the conditions to do agriculture are favorable. She has experience keeping livestock. Her husband and mother-in-law help her to do the business. She also has land where she plants vegetables and fruit. They use fruit and vegetables to eat and sell in the domestic market. She uses leftover food as forage for the livestock. Recently, she asked for a loan to buy livestock. Dilfuza hopes to be supported by Kiva lenders and IMON.

loans.use: To buy livestock

loans.name: Sardal

texts.ru: Сардал, 52 года, замужем, мать 2 детей. Образование среднее, она на протяжении 30 лет занимается животноводством, добилась очень хороших результатов, у нее есть 4 коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В Банк «Бай - Тушум» Сардал обратилась за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. На прибыль от кредита Сардал планирует увеличить своё хозяйство.
texts.en: Sardal is 52 years old and the married mother of two children.  She has a secondary education and she has been involved in animal husbandry for 30 years.  She has achieved great success and now owns four cows.  She makes a monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS).  She is taking a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) from Bai Tushum in order to buy more livestock.  She is planning to use her profits from this loan to expand her farming business.

loans.use: to buy some livestock and increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Eliecer Enrique

texts.es:
Comprar vivienda es la meta que motiva a levantarse y trabajar duramente a Eliecer, quien con su negocio de cría de gallinas ponedoras ha logrado ser útil y apoyar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. 

Eliecer buscando ser más competitivo, más prospero frente a la competencia, perdurar en el tiempo, mejorar las ventas, tener mayor existencia en su granja quiere solicitar un crédito para mejorar su galpón y comprar gallinas ponedoras para tener una producción de huevos más alta y ser un distribuidor importante de huevos y pollos en la region.
texts.en:
Eliecer is motivated to wake up and work hard by his goal of owning his own house. With a business raising laying hens, Eliecer has learned to be useful and to support his family with household costs.

Eliecer is looking to have a more competitive business. He wants the business to be sustainable, to increase sales, and to have a bigger farm. Eliecer is applying for a loan in order to improve his shed and to buy laying hens and increase egg production. He wants to be a big distributor of chicken in the local region.

loans.use: to improve his shed and to buy laying hens and increase egg production.

loans.name: Elenis

texts.es:
Con su sonrisa y gran corazón, Elenis ha tenido una gran acogida en su barrio desde que abrió su restaurante en su casa hace 30 años con gran esfuerzo y con un deseo en su mente, el de salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar insumos e ingredientes como harina, maíz, carne, pollo, aliños, entre otros.

Con estos ingredientes podrá continuar cocinando y preparando las delicias que con sus manos trabajadoras ha venido ofreciendo y sirviendo.

Apoya a Elenis con su negocio y has que su vida sea mejor con un préstamo!
texts.en:
With a smile and a big heart, Elenis has had a lot of custom since she opened a restaurant in her house 30 years ago. With a lot of work and a strong will, Elenis has progressed in life and improved her family’s living conditions.

Elenis is applying for a loan in order to buy supplies and ingredients, such as flour, corn, meat, chicken, and dressing.

She will use these ingredients to continue cooking and preparing delicious meals that her hard-working hands have been selling and serving for so long.

Support Elenis’ business and make her life better with a loan!

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients, such as flour, corn, meat, chicken, and dressing.

loans.name: Thủy

texts.en:
Thủy is 32 years old and married with 2 children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Thủy works in agriculture, farming food. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

In 2014, Thủy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business, and she has already successfully repaid 1 loan from them.

The main hardship that she faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. Therefore she is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Thủy hopes to maintain a successful business which does well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Yamwaya Group

texts.fr: Yamwaya vient de finir son premier prêt kiva. Les remboursements ont été fait normalement. Rasmata, membre représentatif remercie tout le personnel et les prêteurs de kiva pour le soutien. Avec le prêt, Rasmata avait pu payer les œufs et les oignons pour vendre.Elle a eu un bénéfice qui lui a permis de payer des habits pour ses enfants, de faire quelques dépenses pour sa famille et surtout d'augmenter son activité. Rasmata a encore besoin de crédit pour continuer son activité. Contrairement au premier prêt, cette fois-ci au Burkina, le prix des oignons est moins cher donc Rasmata pourra en acheter pour stocker et revendre. Elle va aussi acheter les plaquettes d’œuf pour vendre. A l'issue de ses ventes son bénéfice lui permettra de continuer son activité.
texts.en:
The Yamwaya group just finished reimbursing its first Kiva loan. Reimbursments were made normally. Rasmata, representing the group, thanks all the staff and Kiva lenders for their support.

With the loan Rasmata was able to buy eggs and onions for retail sales. She made profits enabling her to pay for her children's clothing, spend some money for her family and especially expand her business activity. Rasmata now needs another loan to pursue her business.

Unlike the first loan, the price of onions is now cheaper in Burkina Faso, so Rasmata can buy to stock up for later sales. She will also buy trays of eggs to resell. After sales are conducted, her profits will enable her to pursue her activities.

loans.use: buy trays of eggs and bags of onions, for resale

loans.name: Lang's Group

texts.en:
Lang, 29, is a married mother of two children who are both too young to go to school. She lives in Cheung Prey district of Kampong Cham province. 

The sources of her family’s income are from rice farming, two hectares of farmland and fattening ducks, which she has been doing for ten years. She can earn about 58,000 KHR per day to support her family’s needs. 

This is her group's first loan cycle with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. Lang is leading this group of five to apply for the loan, and with her portion she will buy fertilizer and duck feed. 

She hopes that she can earn more money to expand her current business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and duck feed

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Hello Lenders! 

The above picture presents to you Elizabeth, a very hardworking mother and ambitious go-getter who is 41 years of age and hails from the Nandi Hills area of Kenya, a rural town in the famous Rift valley. 

Elizabeth and her handsome husband support each other as a team and have been doing mixed farming for the past 17 years. Through all these years she has been able to take care of her family and pay school fees for her children. Although this humble mum has been making profit, not everything has been a bed of roses. She has also faced financial challenges.

Elizabeth's upbringing was challenging and she has faced many economic problems, but this ever-smiling mum has been making great improvements. She believes that through your loan, she will be able to realize her goal of improving her living conditions and transforming her life. Through Juhudi Kilimo, Elizabeth has gone through training and is very honest and disciplined with finances. She hopes that through profits from her business, she will fully pay back the loan. 

Because the Nandi Hills area has a ready market for cereals, she is kindly seeking a loan to buy cereals to be able to improve her income level. 

Elizabeth is also visionary and hopes that through accumulated profits she will be able to open a large cereal selling shop that will boost her income and completely turn her life around.

loans.use: to buy cereals to sell

loans.name: Ba

texts.en:
Ba has a manufacturing business sewing clothes, and he has been involved in this business for 5 years. He is 30 years old and married with 2 children. He lives and works in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Ba's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Ba faces in his life is not having a hygienic latrine. Therefore he is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

With his business profit, Ba hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, for his children to do well in school, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Omurhon

texts.ru: Омурхон, 21 год, замужем, детей нет. У Омурхон среднее образование, она 2 года занимается сельским хозяйством. На сегодняшний день прибыль Омурхон составляет до 25,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. У нее в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, также на земельном наделе мерою 2,4 ГА она выращивает клевер и хлопок для реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Омурхон обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Омурхон планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Omurhon is 21 years old, married, with no children yet.  She has a secondary education and has been involved in agriculture for two years.  She currently makes a monthly income of 25,000 som (KGS).  She has two cows on her farm and she also cultivates clover and cotton for resale on 2.4 hectares of land.  In order to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy some sheep and therefore increase her livestock headcount.  She is planning to re-invest her earnings from this loan into further growing her business.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru: Наргиза, 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Наргизы среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она работает в частной теплице. Также уже много лет сама занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорству, радостному отношению  жизни, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Наргизы, на сегодняшний день у нее в хозяйстве есть корова. На 0,34 Га земли она выращивает рис для реализации.  Наргиза обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку подготовку земли к весенне полевым работам, чтобы выращивать экологически-чистый рис. Наргиза намерена в дальнейшем расширять свой бизнес, что позволит ей накопить на постройку собственной теплицы.
texts.en: Nargiza is 42 years old and married.  She and her husband are raising three children.  Nargiza has a secondary education.  She works in a privately-owned greenhouse, and this activity constitutes her family's main source of income.  For many years she has also been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture.  Thanks to a positive attitude in life, to her perseverance, commitment and hard work, she currently has one cow and she grows rice for resale on 0.34 hectares of land.  Nargiza has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to prepare her land for the spring and to grow organic rice.  In the future, Nargiza wants to increase her business, which will allow her to save enough money to build her own greenhouse.

loans.use: to prepare her land for the spring in order to grow organic rice.

loans.name: Durdona

texts.ru: Дурдона, 22 года, замужем. Уже 4 года в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством. Осенью прошлого года, в связи с подорожанием сена и корма для скота, Дурдона продала 2 коровы, на вырученные средства открыла магазин. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть корова. Ее прибыль составляет около 8,000 сом (KGS). Дурдона решила вновь развить свою животноводческую деятельность, поэтому она обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы от кредита Дурдона планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Durdona is 22 years old and married.  She has been raising livestock for four years already, and this activity constitutes her family's main source of income.  Last autumn, because of an increase in the price of hay and livestock feed, she sold two cows and used the money from this sale to open a shop.  She now has one cow and she makes an income of 8,000 som (KGS).  Durdona has decided to start re-developing her animal husbandry activity and, for this reason, she is taking a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy some sheep.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her livestock headcount and to save some money to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy some sheep and increase her livestock headcount.

loans.name: Sabira

texts.ru: Сабира, 29 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. Образование-среднее, на протяжении 5 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Сабиры, на сегодняшний день она имеет хорошее хозяйство: 3 коровы, на 0,64 Га она выращивает картофель, кукурузу и клевер. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы. Доходы от кредита Сабира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, а также она хочет построить еще сараи для скота.
texts.en: Sabira is 29 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She has a secondary education and has been raising livestock and growing crops for the past five years.  At the moment, she makes a monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she now has a well developed farming business which comprises three cows and 0.64 hectares of land on which she grows potatoes, corn and clover for resale.  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy an additional cow.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her livestock headcount and to build a barn for her cattle.

loans.use: to buy one cow and increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Oybarchin

texts.en:
Oybarchin is a talented woman. She is living in a small village in the nearby hills. She was born in the northern part of the country in 1972. She is widowed and has three children. She is busy with agriculture. She was a participant in the “Women Entrepreneurs – Achieve Success” training provided by IMON to support women in Tajikistan. She was interested in buying livestock and having her own business. She is planning to enlarge her business each year and open a farm in the future. But now she needs to buy livestock and earn money to feed her family. 

She is asking financial support from KIVA lenders to buy livestock. Oybarchin hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Marziya

texts.en:
Marziya is a confident woman. She was born in a small village near the mountains. The weather in winter is very cold. She is living in the northern part of Tajikistan. She is married and has four children. Marziya has a big family and they live happily with each other. She participated in the “Women Entrepreneurs – Achieve Success” training provided by IMON. Marziya is a responsible, creative and hospitable person. She liked training and is interested in buying livestock and start her business. She has experience in agriculture and wishes to do business in it. 

Marziya has requested a loan from IMON and KIVA lenders to buy livestock and hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгул, 41 год, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, занимается полеводством и животноводством. Стартовав с 10,000 сом (KGS), благодаря упорному труду, на сегодняшний день у Назгул имеется 1,0 ГА арендованного земельного надела, на котором она ежегодно выращивает рис для реализации. Также в хозяйстве есть 5 коров. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Назгул обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) для обработки земли для выращивания риса. Доходы от кредита Назгул хочет вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Nazgul is 41 years old and the married mother of two children.  She has a secondary education and is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture.  She started her business with an initial capital of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently rents one hectare of land on which she cultivates rice annually for resale.  She also has five cows on her farm.  She makes a monthly income of up to 15,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to prepare her land for the spring and to cultivate rice.  Nazgul is planning to re-invest the earnings from her loan into further growing her business.

loans.use: to prepare her land for the spring in order to grow organic rice.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
La socia Luzmila pertenece al banco comunal DIOS ES AMOR HABASPATA.
La socia tiene 34 años de edad  tiene 02 hijos y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
La socia se siente agradecida  por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Member Luzmila belongs to the communal bank Dios es Amor (God is Love) Habaspata.
The members is 34 years old, she has 2 children and she is single. She alternates her daily activities working in agriculture. She has had success with her business, which is going well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. She wishes to keep working, and in this way keep supporting her family. 
She asks for a loan for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers. 
She is grateful for the given loan and is committed to meeting the established payment fees.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Gulbaira

texts.ru: Гулбайра, 45 лет, замужем, есть ребенок. У Гулбайры среднее образование, с 2010 года в качестве дополнительного дохода занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 5 коров, 50 овец и 35 коз. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). Гулбайра аккуратная, спокойная, пунктуальная. Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Гулбайра планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Gulbaira is 45 years old, married, and has a child. Gulbaira has a secondary education, and since 2010 has been farming as a source of secondary income. She has 5 cows, 50 sheep, and 35 goats on her farm. Her monthly profits amount to 15,000 som (KGS). Gulbaira is orderly, unshakable, and punctual. 

For the further development of her farm, she has approached Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock to increase her herd's headcount. Gulbaira plans to use the proceeds from the loan to develop her farm.

loans.use: to buy some livestock to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una mujer de 42 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la elaboración de queso artesanal.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, fuerte, luchadora, constante, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad ‘Catacora’ que se encuentra a una distancia de 60 kilómetros al oeste de la ciudad, cercana al algo sagrado Titicaca, donde los agricultores acostumbran la siembra de quinua, cebada, papa, haba, oca. De clima frío y seco, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-14 grados centígrados, y donde los rayos solares golpean con fuerza la superficie.
Julia es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus familiares que trabajan la tierra, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe y ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua de pozo extraída mediante una bomba y energía eléctrica. Su negocio es la elaboración de queso artesanal, las variedades más comunes son; queso fresco, chaqueño y menonita. “mi negocio es herencia ancestral, nos dedicamos a esto desde antes de la generación de mis abuelos…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que su amplia experiencia la ha llevado a contar con una clientela fija y continua, la desventaja es el clima del lugar que hace que falte el afrecho. Su sueño es aumentar su producción de quesos, ella desea realizar la compra de ganado lechero para aumentar su producción lechera para incrementar su producción de queso. Esta es su 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 20 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Julia solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado lechero para producir mayor cantidad de leche e incrementar su producción de queso artesanal.
texts.en:
Julia is a 53 year old, single woman, she has no children and her business is the production of handmade cheese. She enterprising, independent, strong, determined, persevering, responsible and hard-working.
Her business is in the Catacora community, which is 60km east of the city, near to the sacred Titicaca, where farmers tend to plant quinoa, barley, potatoes, and broad beans. The climate is cold and dry, with the temperature varying between 2-14 degrees Celsius daily, and the sun's rays hitting the Earth's surface with force.

Julia has a dark complexion, brown eyes, long, black braided hair, is quite short, has a medium physique, and she dresses traditionally (hat, blanket and skirt). Her native language is Aymara which is spoken instead of Spanish for both culture and business. Her life is shared with her relatives who work on the farm, they live in their own brick home with a corrugated iron roof which has a water well which extracts using an electrical pump.
Her business is the production of handmade cheese, the most common varieties are fresh cheese chaqueño y menonita . Julia says 'my business is ancestral heritage, we have dedicated ourselves to this since before my grandparents's generation'.  The advantage of her business is that her experience has led to her having many fixed, loyal customers, the disadvantage is that the climate there means that she cannot grow bran.


This is her first loan after 20 years developing her business. 
These are the reasons why Julia is asking for a loan, she wishes to purchase a dairy cow to produce more milk to produce more handmade cheese.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cattle to produce the most amount of milk possible and increase her production of handmade cheese

loans.name: Mercyline

texts.en:
Wonderful Kiva lenders! Meet Mercyline, an ever-smiling young farmer from Kenyenya County, in Kenya. She has defied the common thinking of most Kenyans about agriculture. She is a proud owner of a small parcel of land, on which she has been practicing mixed farming for the past five years. Her primary sources of income are selling eggs, planting trees and milk and through this venture she has earned a decent income. She also engages in personal business in order to make ends meet. Mercyline passionately loves dairy farming, taking care of her cows gives her great joy. She is an early riser and wakes up every day in the morning to go and milk her cow.

Although this humble mum has been making profits by selling milk to her neighbors and the local market, she is faced with the challenge of meeting the demand. She is known for having the best-quality milk. Through word of mouth, customers have been flocking to her farm for milk. Mercyline is seeking a loan to buy a quality dairy cow, which will produce milk that is high in nutrients and will be able to satisfy the demand. With the loan, she will buy a dairy cow that can produce between 10 and 20 litres of milk a day. This will help fully satisfy the demand.

Through Juhudi Kilimo, which is a field partner, Mercyline attended training sessions and was taught the best financial management skills. This will help her to save more money, to repay the loan fully, and to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a quality dairy cow.

loans.name: Surmakan

texts.ru: Сурмакан, 36 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают сына. У Сурмакан высшее образование, работает учителем в школе, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 15 лет назад, с покупки скота на 3,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Сурмакан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 коровы, 12 овец, 4 лошади. Ежемесячный доход с учетом заработной платы составляет около 29,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Сурмакан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 90,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и нетели для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Сурмакан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на постройку сараев для скота.
texts.en:
Surmakan is 36 years old and married. She and her husband are raising a son. Surmakan has a higher education and works as a teacher in a grade school, and she raises cattle and grows crops. She started farming 15 years ago, when she purchased her first head of livestock for 3,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Surmakan's extremely hard work, her farm now has 4 cows, 12 sheep, and 4 horses. Her monthly income, including the income from her job, is about 29,000 som (KGS). 

In order to further develop her business, Surmakan has approached Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 90,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow and a heifer to increase the headcount of her herd. Surmakan plans to put the proceeds from her loan toward further augmenting her herd, and plans to save money to build shelters for her livestock.

loans.use: to buy one cow and one heifer in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Andrea Del Carmen

texts.es:
Andrea es una mujer muy emprendedora y tenaz, con grandes deseos que ha estado cultivando y tratando de cumplir.

Tiene un pequeño negocio de preparación y venta de queso de leche de vaca.

Con esta actividad intenta día a día  salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia compuesta por sus 3 hijos quienes son el motor de su vida y su motivación para luchar diariamente.

Con su gran capacidad de trabajo es capaz de sostenerse y progresar en tiempo.

Andrea solicita un préstamo para realizar ampliación y mejora locativa de su sitio de trabajo y si poder trabajar de una manera mas cómoda y efectiva.

Con tu ayuda Andrea podrá tener un negocio mejor!
texts.en:
Andrea is a very enterprising, tenacious woman with ambitious goals which she has been cultivating and trying to meet.  She has a small business making and selling cheese made of cow's milk.

Through this activity she tries to get ahead day after day and improve her family's living conditions.  She has three children who are her motivation in life for struggling every day.

With a great work capacity she is able to support herself and prosper.

The loan requested by Andrea is to expand and renovate her workplace so she can work in a more comfortable, efficient environment.  

With your help Andrea can run a better business.

loans.use: To expand and renovate her workplace to make it more comfortable and efficient.

loans.name: Aitilla

texts.ru: Айтилла, 53 года, замужем, есть сын. У Айтиллы- среднее образование. С 2000 года занимается животноводством, у нее развитое хозяйство. Ежемесячный доход от ведения бизнеса составляет до 20,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 8 овец, лошадь. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айтилла обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для разведения. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и улучшение благосостояния ее семьи.
texts.en:
Aitilla is 53 years old, married, and has a son. Aitilla has a secondary education. She has been practicing animal husbandry since 2000, and has a well-developed farm. Her monthly income from running this business amounts to 20,000 som (KGS). She has 2 cows, 8 sheep, and a horse on her farm. 

In order to further develop her farm, Aitilla has approached Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock for breeding. Aitilla will use the proceeds from her loan to add further livestock to her herd and to increase the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase her herd headcount.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy typical clothing such as blouses, skirt fabric, waistbands and aprons.

loans.name: Nataly De Jesus

texts.es:
Laboriosa y soñadora, son dos palabras que describen perfectamente a Nataly, una mujer trabajadora y de familia, que hace lo que este a su alcance para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposo.

Se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos en el municipio de Lorica.
Esta es una actividad muy común en esta región y gran parte de sus habitantes la practican.

Ella posee gran conocimiento en esta materia y considera que necesita un pequeño impulso para incrementar sus ventas y aumentar su negocio, es por esta razón que solicita un auxilio económico para invertirlo en la compra de materiales para el mantenimiento del corral donde alberga sus animales.

Con este préstamo podrá continuar con su actividad que es la única fuente de ingresos de su familia.

Se siente agradecida con los prestamistas de Kiva y con la Corporación Interactuar que hacen posible que su negocio crezca y mejore.
texts.en:
Industrious and ambitious are words that perfectly describe Nataly, a hard-working mother who does what she can to give her children and husband a better quality of life.

She raises and sells pigs in the municipality of Lorica.  It is a very common business in this region where many locals practice it.

Nataly has a vast knowledge of the subject and feels she needs a small boost to increase sales and business.  Therefore she is requesting financial help to buy materials for maintenance of the corral where she keeps her animals.

With this loan she will be able to continue her activity which is the only source of income for the family.

She is grateful to Kiva lenders and Corporacion Interactuar for making it possible to grow and improve her business.

loans.use: To buy materials for maintenance of her animal corral.

loans.name: Dairo Manuel

texts.es:
Dairo vive con su pareja y tienen 6, vive felizmente junto con su familia en zona rural del municipio de Lorica.
En la actualidad ya cumplió 10 años de estar trabajando con la cría de cerdos de engorde, actividad con la que ha intentado sobrevivir y sacar adelante a su familia para que nunca les falte nada. 

Ha tenido dificultades económicas que han afectado su negocio y que lo han obligado a detener sus actividades en ciertas ocasiones. 

Sueña con mejorar el lugar para la cría de sus animales y también con tener una planta de engorde de cerdos, por esto pasa la solicitud de un préstamo, el cual invertirá en la compra de materiales para la adecuación de sus marraneras y así poder tener sus animales en mejores condiciones para la venta.

Su calidad de vida  y la de su familia se incrementará en la medida que aumentan las ventas de sus animales y alcance las metas establecidas para  un futuro no lejano.

Con el apoyo de este préstamo Dairo podrá continuar trabajando y podrá darle a su familia todo lo mejor.
texts.en:
Dairo lives with his partner and their six children.  He and his family live happily in a rural area of the municipality of Lorica.  He has worked ten years raising pigs in an effort to get ahead and provide for his family so they will not be lacking for anything.

The financial difficulties he has experienced have affected the business and obliged him to delay the activity on certain occasions.

He dreams of a better place to raise his animals and of having a pig fattening farm.  Therefore he is requesting a loan to buy materials to renovate his pig pens so the animals are in better condition for sale.

His quality of life and that of the family will improve as pig sales increase and reach the established goal in the not-too-distant future.

With your support Dairo can continue his work and give his family all the best.

loans.use: To buy materials to fix up and improve his pig pens.

loans.name: Larisa

texts.ru:
Larisa sells clothes at the local markets both in her town and in the region. Due to previous loan she was able to hold the business at the same level despite the economic crisis. Larisa wants to develop her business further. She is open and hardworking person.

Larisa is asking for a loan of 35 000 UAH to increase the assortment of spring clothes. She wants to buy cloaks, jackets and skirts. The loan will help to attract more customers and increase the sales.
texts.en:
Larisa sells clothes at the local markets both in her town and in the region. Due to a previous loan she was able to hold the business at the same level despite the economic crisis. Larisa wants to develop her business further. She is a open and hardworking person.

Larisa is asking for a loan of 35 000 UAH to increase the assortment of spring clothes. She wants to buy cloaks, jackets and skirts. The loan will help to attract more customers and increase the sales.

loans.use: to increase the assortment of spring clothes such as cloaks, jackets and skirts.

loans.name: Aigul

texts.ru: Айгул, 35 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей, старший сын- студент. Образование у Айгул- среднее. С 2000 года стала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря ее непосильному труду и емкой работе, Айгул развила свое хозяйство до 20 коров и 20 овец, также на участке мерою 3,0 Га она выращивает люцерну для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль Айгул составляет до 18,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айгул обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота в своем хозяйстве, что позволит ей накопить на высшее образование ее детей.
texts.en:
Aigul is 35 years old, married, and has 4 children. Her oldest son is a student. Aigul has a secondary education. In 2000, she began to practice field and animal husbandry. Thanks to her unbearably hard work and endless labor, Aigul has developed her farm so that she has 20 cows and 20 sheep, and she also has a 3.0 hectare plot of land where she grows alfalfa for on-farm consumption and resale. Aigul's monthly profits amount to 18,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her farm, Aigul has approached Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy cows. She plans to use the proceeds from her loan to further increase the headcount of livestock on her farm, which will allow her to save for the higher education of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional cows in order to increase the size her herd.

loans.name: Myrzaiym

texts.ru: Мырзайым 25 лет, не замужем, живет с родителями. В качестве дохода для своей семьи, Мырзайым 4 года занимается животноводством. В хозяйстве Мырзайым на сегодняшний день имеется 3 коровы, 9 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мырзайым обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 16,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для откорма и реализации. Мырзайым доходы от кредита планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и хочет улучшить жилищные условия в доме ее родителей.
texts.en:
Myrzaiym is 25 years old, not married, and lives with her parents. As a means of income for her family, Myrzaiym has been raising animals for 4 years. Today, Myrzaiym has 3 cows and 9 sheep on her farm. 

In order to further develop her business, Myrzaiym has approached Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 16,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow to fatten and resell. Myrzaiym plans to use the proceeds from the loan to further expand her farm, and wants to improve the living conditions in her parents' house.

loans.use: to buy one cow to fatten and resell.

loans.name: Rafael Arturo

texts.es:
Rafael es un hombre muy entregado a su trabajo pues a sus 33 años de edad trabaja incasablemente todos los días de la semana de lunes a domingo en su negocio de producción de queso de leche de vaca. 

Padre de 3 hijos menores de edad que dependen totalmente de el ve una oportunidad de una entidad que le brinda la confianza de tener un crédito para mejorar su negocio y soñar con su fábrica de producción de mas grande y creer que es posible alcanzar este sueño. 

Le dedica 3 horas diarias a su negocio en la parte de producción y unas 8 horas a la venta de sus quesos.

Solicita un crédito para la adecuación de su lugar de trabajo para tener un espacio más amplio y mejor para trabajar. 

Con la ayuda de este crédito Rafael producirá mas alimentos y le permitirá obtener mejores ingresos para cada día darle mejores oportunidades de vida a sus hijos
texts.en:
Rafael is a man dedicated to his work.  At age 33 he spends every day of the week, Monday through Sunday, in his business tirelessly making cheese from cow's milk.

His is the father of three minor dependent children.  Seeing the opportunity of an entity trusting him enough to give him a loan to improve his business, he dreams of a larger production facility and believes it is possible to meet his goal.

Rafael works three hours a day in the production part of his business and eight hours selling cheese.  He is requesting a loan to fix up and expand his workplace to improve his activity.

With this help Rafael will produce more and earn more income so he can give his children better opportunities in life.

loans.use: To fix up and expand his workplace.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Элмира, 23 года, замужем, детей пока нет, но планируют. Образование-высшее. Элмира занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря своей трепетной работе и ответственности, Элмира на сегодняшний день имеет хорошее хозяйство: 3 коровы, а также обрабатывает 0,35 ГА поливной земли, на которой она ежегодно сажает кукурузу. Ежемесячная прибыль ее семьи составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Элмира обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и семян для полеводства. Доходы от кредита Элмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Elmira is 23 years old, married, and does not yet have children, although they plan to. She has a higher education. Elmira raises animals and grows crops. Thanks to her attentive work and responsibility, Elmira now has a good farm: 3 cows, and she also works 0.35 hectares of irrigated land, where she plants corn every year. Her family's monthly profit is 10,000 som (KGS). 

In order to further develop her farm, Elmira has approached Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to buy a sheep and seeds for farming. Elmira will use the proceeds from the loan to further expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase some sheep and seeds for spring field work.

loans.name: Rahima

texts.en:
Rahima is a bright woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1971. She is living in the small village of Guliston. Guliston means the land of flowers. She is married and has two children. Rahima has 21 years' experience of doing business in agriculture. She plants cereal and keeps livestock. She would like to do business in agriculture. She sells the harvest at the domestic market and feeds her family with the profits. She wants to enlarge her business and buy additional livestock in order to have a good income to feed her family. 

Rahima is asking financial support from Kiva lenders to buy livestock. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Sarin's Group

texts.en:
Sarin, 50, is a married mother of four dependent children that she needs to look after. She lives in the Santok district of Kampong Thom province. The sources of her family’s income are from fishing and rice farming for more than ten years. She has been with VisionFund for four cycles already and completely repaid the loan. Now she is leading a group of two members to apply for a loan, with her portion going towards building a private toilet for her family. 

She hopes that her family members will have better living conditions and be healthy.

loans.use: to build a private toilet.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Veuve et âgée de 45 ans, Akossiwa est une femme qui habite le quartier d’Adidogomé avec deux enfants à charge. Akossiwa vend des produits de beauté et des mèches dans le quartier et gagne son revenu grâce à ce commerce. Pour arriver à ses fins, Davigan Akossiwa s’approvisionne deux fois par mois. Pour commander des tissages et des mèches, Akossiwa demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et disposer d’un revenu afin de subvenir favorablement à ses besoins quotidiens
texts.en: 45-year-old Akossiwa is a widow who lives in the district of Adidogomé with two dependent children. She earns an income from her business selling beauty products and hair extensions in her area. She gets her supplies twice a month. Akossiwa is requesting this loan so that she can order more hair weaves and extensions and have enough of an income to be able to meet her daily needs.

loans.use: to buy 3 dozen hair extensions and 5 dozen weaves.

loans.name: Touwendé 2 Group

texts.fr: Nana est très contente du prêt de kiva et remercie le personnel et tous les préteurs. Avec ce prêt,elle avait pu réaliser son commerce, son bénéfice aussi a servi à sa famille. Nana voudrait un nouveau prêt pour continuer son activité. Elle voudrait acheter du céréale encore pour vendre. Pour ce qui est des remboursements le groupe de nana le fait toujours   sans problème. Avec son bénéfice, elle pourra faire une épargne et faire les petites dépenses de ses enfants.
texts.en: Nana was very happy with her previous Kiva-backed loan and would like to thank the personnel and all the lenders. Thanks to that loan, she was able to carry out her business and the profits she made also helped her family. Nana would like a new loan in order to be able to continue with her business. She would like to buy more cereal for resale. Her loan group always manages to repay its loans without any problems. She will use her profits to build up some savings and cover her children's small expenses.

loans.use: to buy cereals (maize, beans, millet) for resale.

loans.name: Véronique

texts.fr:
Coiffeuse de formation, Véronique est certifiée dans cette filière, elle a 20 ans d'expérience. Elle a déjà beaucoup de clients. Avec ces expériences, elle veut encore améliorer et développer son activité. Actuellement, elle cherche un local un peu plus grand et qui se situe au bord d'une route principale pour son salon de coiffure, l'emplacement de son salon en ce moment ne lui satisfait pas,car au deuxième plan. En plus, elle veut des matériels neufs et des produits supplémentaires.
Véronique a 47 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont les 2 premiers sont étudiants à l'université, et les 2 autres collégiens. Son mari est couturier, les deux époux sont deux artistes très connus dans leur ville.
Son souci le plus précieux est l'avenir de ses enfants.
texts.en:
A trained hairdresser, Véronique is a qualified professional with 20 years experience. She already has a lot of customers. Using her experience, she would like to improve and develop her business further. She is presently searching for a bigger place located on the main road to town in which to run her hair salon, as she is not satisfied with her current, inferior, location. She would also like some new equipment and extra products.

Véronique is 47 years old, married and the mother of 4 children, the eldest 2 of whom are going to university and the youngest 2 of whom are attending college. Her husband is a dress maker, both she and her spouse are well known in town for their artistry. The thing she cares about the most is the future of her children.

loans.use: to buy a professional blow-dryer, professional BabyLiss hairstyling tools, brushes, towels, shampoos, serums, cream hair styling products etc.

loans.name: La Révélation B Group

texts.fr: Amani est un commerçant, membre d’un groupe de crédits «La Révélation B», client de l’IMF Hekima, âgé de 27 ans, marié, père de 4 enfants tous scolarisés. Il est vendeur de divers habillements dans un magasin de la ville depuis 6 ans. Il va acheter des souliers, pagnes, vestes, pantalons, jupes, blouses chemises, sous vêtements, etc. Ainsi, il souhaite scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Il remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs exclus du système bancaire classique.
texts.en: Amani is a retailer, a customer of the MFI Hekima and a member of the "La Révélation B" loan group. He is 27 years old, married and the father of 4 children who all go to school. He has been selling clothing in a shop in town for 6 years. He plans to buy items of clothing including shoes, pagnes (highly colourful and decorative West African clothing), jackets, trousers, skirts, blouses, shirts and underwear. He would like to ensure that his children are fed and educated. Finally, he thanks Hekima for the support it gives to entrepreneurs excluded from the classic banking system.

loans.use: to buy shoes, pagnes, jackets, trousers, skirts, blouses, shirts, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Gaël Group

texts.fr: Mwayuma est commerçante, trésorière du groupe solidaire «Gaël», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, veuve, âgée de 45 ans, mère de 4 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle commença son business avec de fonds reçu de sa petite sœur. Elle est vendeuse des divers produits cosmétiques dans un magasin de la place depuis 14 ans. Elle va acheter des lotions, tubes, crèmes, laits de beauté sans hydroquinones,etc. Ainsi, elle souhaite accroitre son capital, construire une maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Mwayuma is a retailer, a customer of the MFI Hekima and the treasurer of the Gaël solidarity group. She is a widow, 45 years old and the mother of 4 children who all attend school. She started her business with funds she received from her little sister. She has been selling various beauty products in a local shop for 14 years. She plans to buy products including lotions, creams and beauty milks (without hydroquinones). She would like to increase her capital, build a house and ensure that her children are fed and educated. Finally, she would like to thank Hekima for the support it gives to non-bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy lotions, creams, beauty milks (without hydroquinones), etc.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Juana siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer trabajadora, luchadora y emprendedora. Desde muy joven inició trabajando como asistente del hogar, y luego inicio con su propio negocio de venta de condimentos, ahora es dueña de una pulpería, que atiende con la ayuda de su esposo para así aumentar los ingresos económicos de su hogar. 
Por ello, solicita un crédito para la compra de granos básicos, papel higiénico, jabones, golosinas, gaseosa, etc. Lo cual se servirá para ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes. En consiguiente sus ganancias aumentarán y con ese dinero podrá ampliar su casa.
texts.en:
Juana has always been known for being a hard working and entrepreneurial woman. Since she was very young, she began working as a household assistant and then started her own business selling condiments. Now she owns a store that she manages with the help of her husband so she can expand her family's income.

For this, she is requesting a loan to buy basic grains, toilet paper, soaps, candies, sodas, etc. which will allow her to offer more variety to her customers. Then her earnings will increase and with that money she will be able to expand her house.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, toilet paper, soaps, candies, sodas, etc.

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es: Yanira de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, también a la crianza de ganado repasto, tiene 5 años de experiencia en el rubro su esposo le ayuda en las siembras, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Yanira, 32 years old, lives in her own house with her husband, She works growing corn and beans and also raises cattle. She has 5 years of experience in this field. Her husband helps her with the crops. She sells her products in the places around where she lives and with what she gets from her sales she manages to cover some of the household expenses. She is asking for the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, pesticide, herbicide, etc. and improve the land, which is shown in the photo, to be able to have better income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, pesticide, herbicide, etc. and improve the land.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy products for cooking such as rice, meat, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Grupo Pacut 2 Group

texts.es:
María del Rosario(la primera del lado derecho de la fotografía) es la líder del grupo que ahora se encuentra muy agradecida, porque gracias a ello lograron comprar sus insumos y darle el mantenimiento que el cultivo de banano necesitaba, y lograron muy buena cosecha pero también mejoro sus ingresos, ellos ahora se ven a la necesidad de darle mantenimiento al cultivo de café,  pero una de las dificultades que ellos tienen es que no cuenta con el capital suficiente, por tal motivo solicitan un nuevo crédito para comprar sus insumos y darle el mantenimiento a su cultivo de café.
Ellos tienen las esperanzas de conseguir el crédito para seguir mejorado sus vidas y también contar con un negocio.
texts.en: María del Rosario (the first from the right in the photo) is the leader of the group that is now very thankful because, thanks to that (previous loan), they have managed to buy the resources needed and maintain their banana crop and they had a very good harvest but also improved their income. They now see the need to maintain their coffee crop but one of the difficulties that they have is they don't have sufficient capital. For this reason, they are requesting a new loan to buy the resources to maintain their coffee crop. They have hopes of obtaining the loan to keep improving their lives and also have a business.

loans.use: to buy items needed to maintain coffee crops.

loans.name: Misael  De Jesus

texts.es: Misael de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, posee 20 años de experiencia en la actividad, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarla en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa,  con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para continuar con sus cultivos y así poder tener mejores ingreso para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Misael, 52 years old, lives in his own house with his wife. He works growing corn and beans and has 20 years of experience in this work. When his harvest is ready, he stores it in the granaries which are shown in the photo to later sell it in the different markets which are near his house. With what he gets from his sales, he manages to cover some of the household expenses. He is asking for the loan to purchase fertilizers, compost, pesticide, herbicide, etc. to continue with his crops and in this way have more income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, compost, pesticide, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Digna Maria

texts.es:
Más de 20 años, tiene Digna de haber iniciado con su negocio de venta de ropa, en una tienda que abrió en su casa, gracias a la ayuda de su hijo que le envía remesas desde Estados Unidos y con lo cual ha podido abastecerse de mercadería. Su tienda es muy popular en su zona, por la calidad y variedad de productos que ofrece, lo cual le ha hecho ganar mucha clientela. 
Por lo cual, solicita un crédito para la compra de camisas, pantalones, zapatos, vestidos, carteras. Esto le será de gran ayuda porque al ofrecer nuevos estilos de ropa, sus ventas aumentaran y con ese dinero podrá invertirlo en algunas mejoras de su hogar.
texts.en:
More than 20 years ago, Digna began her business selling clothing in a store that she opened in her house. She thanks the help of her son who sends remittances from the US, with which she has been able to stock the merchandise. Her store is very popular in the zone, for its quality and the variety of products that it offers, which has gained her a large customer base.

For this, she asks for a loan to purchase shirts, pants, shoes, dresses, and wallets. This will be a great help because by offering the new clothing styles, her sales will increase and with this money she will be able to invest in some improvements on her house.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, pants, shoes, dresses and wallets.

loans.name: Onimanoro Judith Mireille

texts.fr:
38 ans, mariée à un chauffeur, Onimanoro est mère de 3 enfants de 15, 9 et 5 ans qui sont tous scolarisés dans une école privée.
Elle est épicière depuis plus de 10 ans.Elle était déjà dans le commerce avant même de démarrer l'épicerie.
Elle a donc tant d'année d'expérience en la matière.
En ce moment, le prix du riz ne cesse pas d'augmenter à cause du cyclone et de l’inondation qui s 'étaient survenus au mois de février et mars, la plupart de la riziculture sont catastrophiques dans le pays.
C'est la raison pour laquelle, Onimanoro demande un crédit pour acheter des sacs de riz de différentes sortes.
Le riz constitue l'aliment de base des Malagasy.
Faire de la vente en gros et réhabiliter son lieu de vente sont les objectifs à court terme de Onimanoro.
texts.en:
Onimanoro is 38 years old, married to a driver and the mother of 3 children aged 15, 9 and 5 who all attend a private school. She has been selling groceries for over 10 years. She was already in retail before she started selling groceries and therefore has a lot of experience in business.

Right now, the price of rice is constantly rising; due to the cyclone and the flooding that occurred in February and March, most of the country's rice cultivation has been badly hit. This is why Onimanoro is requesting a loan to buy bags of different types of rice. Rice is a dietary staple for the Malagasy people.

Onimanoro's short-term objectives are to start selling wholesale and to refurbish her sales location.

loans.use: to buy 14 50-kilo bags of rice (Malagasy rice and imported rice).

loans.name: Alba Nury

texts.es:
Alba, a sus 53 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos. 
Debido a la falta de oportunidades laborales ha pasado por una situación económica muy difícil, pues no cuenta con el apoyo del padre de sus hijos y está desempleada; esto la llevó a buscar opciones para salir adelante y desea montar su propio negocio, un Café-Bar.

Por esta razón se motiva para solicitar el crédito, que invertirá en la compra de un enfriador, tv, surtido de licores y algunos comestibles, de esta manera dará inicio a su idea de negocio, aprovechando la buena ubicación del sector donde pondrá su negocio, pues es una zona muy transitada y existe la posibilidad de atraer muchos clientes potenciales. 

De esta forma, Alba espera poder recibir los recursos necesarios para salir adelante al lado de su familia y poder ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor educación, además esto servirá como impulso para avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal sueño que es montar un negocio en un local bien acreditado, que le genere buenos ingresos para dejar un legado a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Alba, 53, is a single mum to two children. Due to the lack of work opportunities she has been through a very tough financial situation, she also receives no support from the father of her children and she is unemployed. All of this has led her to look for other options that would help her to get ahead and she hopes to set up her own business, a café-bar. 

It is for this reason that Alba is requesting a loan. She will invest it in the purchase of a cooler, a tv, a selection of liquors and some food, and this way she will set in motion her idea of having a business. She will also make the most of her good location, since it is a busy area with the possibility of attracting many potential clients.

By setting up this business, Alba hopes to be able to receive the necessary means to help her family and to be able to offer her children a better education. In addition, this will help her on her way to achieving her main dream which is to create a business in a reputable local bar, which will generate good income to leave a legacy for her children.

loans.use: to buy a cooler, a tv, a selection of liquors and some food in order to set up her own business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 23 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, dedica a la comercialización de artesanías su negocio está ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada tiene 5 años de dedicarse a la as ventas y con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos artesanales por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos y darle a su hija una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This young woman whose face is blurred, for the reason that she is 23 years old and lives in a high risk area, makes a living by selling handicrafts. Her business is located near her home in a very busy area and she has been selling there for 5 years. With the earnings she makes she manages to cover some of her household expenses. This young woman is a single mum and she lives in her own home with her daughter. She is requesting a loan to buy more wholesale handicraft products so that she can continue her work, and in turn increase her income and provide her daughter with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale handicraft products.

loans.name: Oscar Orlando

texts.es: Oscar de 33 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol tiene más de 12 años de de dedicarse a esa actividad su esposa también le  ayuda en las siembras, vende sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos para su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poder iniciar con la preparación de las siembras y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Oscar, 33 years old, lives in his own house with his life partner and their three children. He works growing corn and beans and has more than 12 years of experience working in this field. His wife also helps him with the crops. He sells his products in the area near where he lives and with what he gets from his sales, he manages to cover some of the household expenses. He is asking for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, organic fertilizer, pesticides, herbicides, etc. and improve the land shown in the photo to be able to begin preparing the crop and in this way have a better quality of life with his family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, organic fertilizer, pesticides, herbicides, etc. and improve the land.

loans.name: Pedro Nicolas

texts.es: Pedro de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino, al cultivo de granos básicos y a la pesca artesanal por temporada, posee más de 5 años de dedicarse a la ganadería y gracias a su trabajo es como logra salir adelante con los gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado de engorde para continuar con la crianza y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Pedro, 38 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and their two children. He works raising cattle, growing basic grains and traditional fishing in season. He has been working for more than 5 years in animal husbandry and thanks to his work, this is how he manages to get ahead with the household expenses. He is asking for a loan to purchase cattle to fatten to continue with raising them and in this way have better income.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to fatten.

loans.name: Jose Silvano

texts.es:
José, de 61 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, es padre de 4 hijos, los cuales ya son independientes y tienen sus propias casas, solo su esposa vive con él.

José, toda su vida se ha dedicado a los trabajos de agricultura; toda su familia se ha dedicado a este rubro y cuando él se independizo, decidió iniciar a cultivar la tierra y su parcela está cerca de su casa. 

José, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, herbicidas, semilla y para pagar mano de obra, para sembrar granos básicos.

José, sueña con obtener un crédito más grande, que le permita mejorar sus cultivos y aumentar sus ganancias, de esta manera logrará brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José, 61 years old, went to school through the second grade. He is married and his wife takes care of the household tasks. He is the father of 4 children, who are now independent and have their own houses. Only his wife lives with him. 

For his whole life, José has worked in agriculture; his whole family has worked in this area and when he became independent he decided to begin to cultivate the land and his plot of land is near his house.

José needs the loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as organic fertilizer, herbicides, seeds and to pay labor costs to plant basic grains.

José dreams of getting a larger loan which will allow him to improve his crops and increase his earnings. In this way he will manage to offer a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as organic fertilizer, herbicides, seeds, and to pay labor costs, to plant basic grains.

loans.name: La Cantuta Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LA CANTUTA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Maranura, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Alejandrina tiene 43 años de edad es casada y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose  a la crianza de  animales menores ,la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de alimentos entre otros para sus animalitos.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the LA CANTUTA communal bank. The bank is located in Maranura district, La Convención province and Cusco department. 

Alejandrina, the member, is 42 years old, married and has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with working raising small animals. She has been working in this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the dedications she puts into her business each day. She wants to be able to continue working so that, in this way, to continue supporting her family.

The member asks for a loan to purchase food for her little animals.

The members are grateful for the granted loan and promise to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase feed and more for her animals.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “BENJAMIN HERMOZA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Yanatile, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Jose se dedica al trabajo en el sector salud, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y el va muy bien, el sueño del socio es mejorar en su trabajo. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar un televisor para su casa.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member is affiliated with the Benjamin Hermoza communal bank, which is located in the Yanatile district of the province of Calca, department of Cuzco. His name is Jose and he works in the health sector from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. He has been in the business for several years and is doing very well for himself. Jose's dream is to get ahead in his job. He is requesting a loan to purchase a television for his home. Jose is happy about the loan and committed to making payments as agreed.

loans.use: to purchase a television for his home.

loans.name: Olinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BENJAMIN HERMOZA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Yanatile, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Olinda  se dedica al negocio de artesania, la socia vende  tejidos, chompas, mantas y telares, la socia vende diferentes tejidos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos y telares. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos, chompas y telares.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member is affiliated with the Benjamin Hermoza communal bank, which is located in the Yanatile district of the province of Calca, department of Cuzco. Her name is Olinda and she works making crafts. She sells knitwear, sweaters, blankets, and looms. Olinda sells various kinds of knitwear and works from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. She has been in the business for 8 years and is doing well for herself. Her dream is to increase her sales of knitwear and looms. Olinda is requesting a loan to purchase knitwear, sweaters, and looms. She is happy about the loan and committed to making payments as agreed.

loans.use: to purchase knitwear, sweaters, and looms.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La socia  Ana se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de repuestos de carros, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de repuestos de carros. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar llantas, espejos y parabrisas para carros.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Group member Ana continues to work selling automotive spare parts. She works from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. Ana has been in the business for five years and is doing very well for herself. Her dream is to expand her business selling automotive spare parts. Ana is requesting a loan to purchase car tires, mirrors, and windscreens. She is happy about the loan and committed to making payments as agreed.

loans.use: to purchase car tires, mirrors, and windscreens.

loans.name: Kelly

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de libros,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante.La socia solicita el credito para comprar libros.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower is still devoted to the business of selling books and has been doing this work for several years. It is through this business that she wants to get ahead. 

She is asking for a loan in order to buy books.

She is happy about the loan and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy books for her business

loans.name: Rendy

texts.en:
Rendy has a family of two and lives in a town in Malang City in Java, Indonesia's most heavily populated island. In Indonesia, you cannot drink city water and most people do not even have access to piped water. Therefore, most Indonesians depend on purchasing or boiling water. 

Rendy heard of a new option for disinfecting water when the promotion crew from Nazava Water Filters held a safe water training in his vicinity. Nazava Water Filters filter well, rain, and city water so it becomes safe to drink without boiling and, hence, without using fuel or electricity. Rendy, who is also a health worker in  his neighborhood, seized the opportunity and became the sales representative of Nazava in his area. 

Rendy requested a loan, which he will use to buy about 30 filters and sell them to his neighbors on credit  making safe drinking water available to 150 people.

loans.use: to purchase water filters

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.en:
Dilafruz is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1979. She is living in a village with her family. She is divorced and has two children. Dilafruz feels responsibility to feed and house her children and parents. 

She has 15 years experience of doing business. She is a baker. She bakes traditional tasty bread and sells it. She wants to get a loan to renovate her house because her house is not good for living. Dilafruz hopes to have a good income from her business to educate and feed her children. She is asking for support to renovate her house. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Las Chaskas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS CHASKAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irma ella es soltera y tiene 56 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva platanos, cafe, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia es una persona trabajadora que por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank of Las Chaskas. This bank is located in the Santa Ana district, belonging to the province of La Convención and the department of Cusco.

The borrower, Irma, is single, 56 years old, and has 3 children. She works cultivating fruit. She has land where she grows bananas, coffee, tangerines, and oranges. She works from 6:00AM until 5:00PM. She is a hardworking person who through this work is bringing up her children. The borrower already has several years’ experience in this business and is doing very well. This woman’s dream is to expand her farmland. She is asking for a loan to buy seed and fertilizer.

The other members are dedicated to the business of selling animals, selling clothing, a grocery store, and selling food.

The borrower is happy to those who are a part of this dream through this medium and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is 43 years old, married, and has seven children. Three of her children are in school.

Ana works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from food vending. 

Ana requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Ana has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Ana aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Luna

texts.en:
Ma. Luna, 29, is a married woman with three children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Ma. Luna has a buy and sell recycled materials business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for seven years. 

Ma. Luna requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more recycled materials such as bottles, steel, iron, cans and other recycled materials to sell.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more recycled materials such as bottles, steel, iron, cans and other recycled materials to sell.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is 25 years old, married, and has one child. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She wants to save some money so that she can provide better living facilities for her child. Her husband has been driving an auto-rickshaw for many years; his income is insufficient to feed the entire family. He has to maintain the auto-rickshaw body but he does not have sufficient cash to fix the problem. 

Amina requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, which she will use for her husband can replace the auto-rickshaw body. She hopes that she will be able to save enough by the time her child is married.

loans.use: to purchase a new auto-rickshaw's body for her husband

loans.name: Saphina

texts.en:
Saphina lives on a hilltop in Nandihills, Kenya, with her husband and their four children. 

Saphina passionately loves dairy farming. Because of her immense farming knowledge, she has turned her farmland into a learning centre. Here, hundreds turn up to get trained in the hope that they will replicate her model on their own farmland. 

The biggest challenge she faces is satisfying the demand for milk in her village. The demand is overwhelming. She is seeking a loan to buy another dairy cow. She believes that through the loan, she will be able to improve her living conditions and be able to secure the future of her children. 

Having gone through training with Juhudi Kilimo, she is confident that the skills she acquired will help her increase her business, and she will be able to pay back the loan. Saphina is confident that if you invest in her dream, you will be affecting the life of her family and children.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: La Révélation A Group

texts.fr: Rubavu est propriétaire d’un cabinet de change de la monnaie dans le centre ville depuis 10 ans, membre du groupe de crédits «La Révélation A», client de l’IMF Hekima, marié, âgé de 28 ans, père de 3 enfants  dont 1 à l’école et 2 sont encore gosses. Il commença avec de fonds de reçu de son décompte final, quand il fut enseignant. Sa conjointe est une commerçante. Elle va acheter la monnaie locale.
